content: specified st yo and pull up yo draw through two loops yo and pull through remaining loops on hook round 01 chain 8 slip_stitch in first chain st to form ring chain 1 12 single_crochet in ring slip_stitch in first single_crochet round 01 fig 1 round 01 chain 8 fig 2 slip_stitch in first chain st to form ring fig 3 chain 1 12 single_crochet in ring slip_stitch in first single_crochet round 02 working from left to right of work * make ring of10 ds p 10 ds reverse slip_stitch in next two single_crochet 6 times fasten_off leave at least 6 inches of thread to weave in daisy completed round 02 fig 1 * make ring of 10 ds p 10 ds close ring fig 2 reverse slip_stitch in next 2 single_crochet fig 3 repeat from * 6 times fasten_off leave at least 6 inches of thread to weave in daisy completed round 3 make ring of 5 ds p 5 ds joined p in p of any petal of center daisy 5 ds p 5 ds close ring * chain 10 make ring of 5 ds joined p in last p of previous ring 5 ds p twice 5 ds close ring chain 10 make ring of 5 ds joined p in last p of previous ring 5 ds joined p in next p of daisy 5 ds p 5 ds 5 times make ring of 5 ds joined p in last p of previous ring 5 ds p 5 ds joined p in first p of first ring 5 ds close ring chain 5 dtr in first of chain 10 at beginning of round make ring of 5 ds p 5 ds joined p in p of any petal of daisy center 5 ds p 5 ds close ring chain 10 make ring of 5 ds joined p in last p of previous ring 5 ds p twice 5 ds close ring chain 5 dtr in first of chain 10 at beginning of round round 03 completed round 04 chain 1 3 single_crochet chain 3 3 single_crochet in same place as join * in chain 10 space work 3 single_crochet chain 3 3 times 3 single_crochet around in next space at beg of round 4 work 3 single_crochet chain 3 3 single_crochet chain 1 half_double_crochet in first single_crochet * in chain 10 space work 3 single_crochet chain 3 3 times 3 single_crochet around half_double_crochet in first single_crochet to complete round 04 round 5 chain 3 bullion st in same place as join * chain 5 jdc in next two chain 3 sps chain 5 bullion st in next chain 3 space around chain 5 jdc in next two chain 3 sps chain 2 double_crochet in top of first bullion st chain 3 yo yarn over hook 8 times insert hook in chain 3 space yo yarn over and pull up yo yarn over and pull through all loops on hook chain 1 to complete bullion st chain 5
